mapper.select: SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%찜%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%국%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%탕%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%밥%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%스시%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%회%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%까%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%중%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%짜%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%짬%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%디너%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%피자%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address FROM ceo_tp ORDER BY ceo_score DESC LIMIT 0, 20;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address FROM ceo_tp ORDER BY ceo_follow_cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 20;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) ORDER BY ceo_score DESC LIMIT 0, 9;

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_menu_img1, A.ceo_store, A.ceo_score, A.ceo_follow_cnt, A.ceo_main_menu, A.ceo_city_address, COUNT(B.ceo_idx) AS review_cnt FROM ceo_tp A JOIN review_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx WHERE (A.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) GROUP BY A.ceo_idx;

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_menu_img1, A.ceo_store, A.ceo_score, A.ceo_follow_cnt, A.ceo_main_menu, A.ceo_city_address FROM ceo_tp A LEFT OUTER JOIN review_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx WHERE (A.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND review_title IS NULL;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) ORDER BY ceo_follow_cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 9;

SELECT B.ceo_idx, A.customer_age, A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store, B.ceo_menu_img1, B.ceo_main_menu, B.ceo_score, B.ceo_follow_cnt FROM CUSTOMER_TP A JOIN CEO_TP B ON INSTR(A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store) > 0 AND IFNULL(SUBSTR( A.customer_follow, INSTR(A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store) + CHAR_LENGTH(B.ceo_store), 1), ',') = ',' AND (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND A.customer_age = #{customAge1} AND A.customer_age = #{customAge2} AND A.customer_age = #{customAge3} AND A.customer_age = #{customAge4} AND A.customer_age = #{customAge5} AND A.customer_age = #{customAge6} group by customer_age;

SELECT B.ceo_idx, A.customer_age, A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store, B.ceo_menu_img1, B.ceo_main_menu, B.ceo_score, B.ceo_follow_cnt, A.customer_gender FROM CUSTOMER_TP A JOIN CEO_TP B ON INSTR(A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store) > 0 AND IFNULL(SUBSTR( A.customer_follow, INSTR(A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store) + CHAR_LENGTH(B.ceo_store), 1), ',') = ',' AND (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND customer_gender = #{genderKey} group by ceo_idx;

SELECT B.ceo_idx, A.customer_age, A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store, B.ceo_menu_img1, B.ceo_main_menu, B.ceo_score, B.ceo_follow_cnt, A.customer_gender, B.ceo_category,( CASE WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 01 THEN '한식' WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 02 THEN '일식' WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 03 THEN '중식' WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 04 THEN '양식' END ) AS food FROM CUSTOMER_TP A JOIN CEO_TP B ON INSTR(A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store) > 0 AND IFNULL(SUBSTR( A.customer_follow, INSTR(A.customer_follow, B.ceo_store) + CHAR_LENGTH(B.ceo_store), 1), ',') = ',' AND B.ceo_category = #{categoryFoods} AND (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) group by ceo_idx;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address,ceo_category FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND ceo_category = #{cateGory} ORDER BY ceo_score DESC LIMIT 0, 9;
